steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fs4fq","text":"Add  Lysis master mix to 2mL screw tube. The final look:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":3,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fv5vb","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4ng5i","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c2llg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"870","error":false,"guid":"F740A4A0C9F611EDA819F3D5E15C6E45","id":"93911","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"7BA3C8B0066C11EEB83B25EE9DC2AA70","height":327.430909090909,"id":380074,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"bomb ext final look.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mvfnbhxvf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mvfkbhxvf.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mvfmbhxvf.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mvfjbhxvf.webp","width":208.67555040556192}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"c1eu2","text":"In 11F, 4°C fridge","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":6,"offset":19,"style":"bold"},{"length":6,"offset":41,"style":"bold"},{"length":6,"offset":66,"style":"bold"}],"key":"1ojhv","text":"Lysis master mix:  225 µL of TE buffer + 375 µL of lysis buffer + 270 µL of 10M ammonium acetate","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cuu6e","text":"Collect   of sample to 2mL screw tube","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":7}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":8,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9hc77","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7r7n2","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a9cqk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"20-50","error":false,"guid":"6D84AE00DD8411ECB8730A58A9FEAC02","id":"93912","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":5}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"elv7c","text":"You can collect up to 100 mg of sample if you can until you bump into the low DNA quality or PCR success rate; by then it means too many inhibitors in the sample and you have to lower the input.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d17ov","text":"Put the 2mL screw tube in mixmill for sample crush, at 3200 rpm    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":65,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"32lu6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7l2p6","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"40f0l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":240,"guid":"C558C816DD8411ECB8730A58A9FEAC02","id":"83090","label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1kaet","text":"Remember to balance if you have odd number of samples","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ddgn5","text":"Put 2mL screw tube in centrifuge for centrifugation, at this condition:  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10","duration":180,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"CEA088CEDD8411ECB8730A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"25","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3eej8","text":"Add   of isopropanol to the 1st well of 96 well plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":11}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ekqtc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hbkc","text":"   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fna7o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"350","error":false,"guid":"E0CAD9F6DD8411ECB8730A58A9FEAC02","id":"93913","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"8D162BF0066811EEB83B25EE9DC2AA70","height":407,"id":380081,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"step1.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mvfwbhxvf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mvftbhxvf.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mvfvbhxvf.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mvfrbhxvf.webp","width":550}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5gqfa","text":"Add   of magnetic beads (10 mg/ml) to the 1st well of 96 deep well plate ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":14}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b6dpt","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7u8te","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d0k0q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5j0ho","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"100","error":false,"guid":"F6DF4BAFDD8411ECB8730A58A9FEAC02","id":"93914","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D52BD890066811EEB83B25EE9DC2AA70","height":394,"id":380086,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"step2.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mvf4bhxvf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mvfybhxvf.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mvf3bhxvf.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mvfxbhxvf.webp","width":550}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":[],"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7bboj","text":"Vortex the bottle and pipetting before using magnetic beads; re-do vortex after adding to 3 samples to prevent set down of magnetic beads","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4u2a9","text":"Add   of the sample (lysate) from the 1.5mL centrifuged tube to the 1st well of 96 deep well plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":13,"length":16}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1bfle","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5vcpd","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5ae5o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f2inn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"300-500","error":false,"guid":"0FA78DAEDD8511ECB8730A58A9FEAC02","id":"93915","label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"image","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"3564C2C0066A11EEB83B25EE9DC2AA70","height":426,"id":380096,"is_video":false,"legend":"","mime":"image/jpeg","nestedSelector":null,"original_name":"step8.jpg","placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mvgebhxvf.jpg","shadow":false,"source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mvgabhxvf.jpg","webp_placeholder":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mvgdbhxvf.webp","webp_source":"https://content.protocols.io/files/mvf9bhxvf.webp","width":550}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":25,"offset":10,"style":"bold"}],"key":"34il4","text":"Pipetting as many lysate as you can, as long as it's free of any cell debris (no solids in your tip) ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
